name: Pogi’s Dog Grooming Wipes – Hypoallergenic Pet Wipes for Paws, Body & Butt – Cleaning & Hydrating, Fragrance Free, 400-Count
short_description: Groom & Refresh Daily – Hypoallergenic dog wipes gently remove dirt, dander, and odors from paws, body, and butt between baths—keeping pets clean and fresh with zero fuss.
Conditioning & Nourishing – Made with soothing Aloe Vera, Vitamin E, and Hawaiian Awapuhi, these pet grooming wipes condition skin and coat for a soft, healthy shine.
Extra-Large & Textured – Sized generously (8 x 9 inches) and textured for durability, ideal for large breeds, thick coats, and even gentle enough for puppies or cats.
Safe & Gentle Formula – Completely free from parabens, sulfates, and alcohol, these wipes are safe to use daily, even around sensitive eyes, ears, and face.
Convenient & Versatile – Perfect for quick cleanups at home, muddy paws after walks, travel, senior pets, pets recovering from surgery, or pets anxious about baths.

name: Dog Wipes for Paws and Butt - Plant Based Lavendar Scented (Pack of 400) - Pet Wipes for Dogs and Cats - Deodorizing Non Toxic Dog Wipes, +12 Additional Travel Wipes
short_description: SOOTHING LAVENDER BLISS SCENT - Refreshify dog grooming wipes are made with Vitamin E, Aloe Leaf, and calming Lavender Oil. Our paw wipes for dogs and cats are for all ages, sizes, and breeds. Perfect for cleaning up after a muddy walk or a quick refresh after a trip to the park.

100% ORGANIC - Made with only organic ingredients and enriched with soothing avocado, aloe, yucca, and other natural ingredients, Refreshify wipes are guaranteed to leave your pet happy and healthy. Hypoallergenic and alcohol free. Soft and gentle for everyday use.

EXTRA MOIST & ODOR CONTROLLING - After a long hike or playing in the park, your dog might smell a bit too 'natural'... Which is why our dog wipes for face & body deliver a thorough cleanse that also neutralizes unpleasant odors, so they're always ready for snuggles.

INCLUDES 12 TRAVEL-FRIENDLY BONUS WIPES - Since life with dogs can get messy on the go, we've included an extra 12 individually wrapped dog bath wipes along with the 4 x 100 count packs of dog wet wipes. Keep your pup clean and fresh between all their walks, hikes, and baths.

REFRESHIFY: NATURAL PLANT BASED CARE - Dogs and cats aren't just pets, they're family. That's why at Refreshify, we craft each & every wipe with 100% plant-based, non-toxic, hypoallergenic ingredients that are 100% safe for dry, itchy, and sensitive skin.

short_description: HELPS RELIEVE ITCHING & DRY SKIN - Our dog wipes are made with colloidal oatmeal & aloe vera to help coat & soothe itchy, dry skin, leaving your best friend's coat soft, plush, & naturally shiny
HEALTHY SHINE, FEELIN' FINE - Our dog bath wipes moisturize, deodorize, freshen, & clean while the botanical fragrances of vanilla & almond leave your pet smelling fresher than ever
SAFE & EFFECTIVE - Our dog wipes are designed with the health of your furry friend in mind. Our products are always non-toxic, paraben, sulfate, phthalate, phosphate, dye, & soap free!
SUGGESTED USE - Open the pack and remove our gentle cleansing wipe. Thoroughly wipe pet with love. Close pack and store in a cool, dry place. Do not flush wipes
CRUELTY-FREE SINCE 1995 - earthbath has a genuine love for pets & the environment. These passions have been at the heart of everything we do, so we can give you the very best pet supplies

name: 400 Unscented Pet Wipes for Paws and Butt Plant Based Hypoallergenic Pets Cleansing & Deodorizing Anal Gland Hygienic Puppy Wipes for Dogs Face and Body Cat Wipes Cleaning Fur Doggie Wipes Doggy Wipes
short_description: Unscented: Free from fragrances, alcohol, and parabens; hypoallergenic and eco-friendly.
Plant-based Deodorizing Ingredient: Zinc Diricinoleate effectively removes odors from pets (dogs, cats, and other animals) including anal gland and fur odors.
Pet-Safe Formula: Uses Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract as a moisturizer.
Made from Plant Fibers: Sourced from sustainable wood resources.
Large Size: Each wipe measures 8"×8" (can be folded in half for wiping your pet's bottom). When pulling out a wipe, gently lift a single sheet to avoid pulling out multiple wipes and prevent waste.
Impressive Cleaning Power: Plant fibers, with better absorbency than polyester, are softer and effectively remove dirt from your dog's dirty paws, ears, fur, face, and eyes (cats too).
The safety lid on the packaging helps to keep the wipes fresh and moist. Remember to close the lid after each use.
If you are not satisfied with purchasing our dog wipes cleaning deodorizing, please feel free to contact us, and we will provide you with the best solution.
Our wipes are not extra-thick, so we recommend folding them when cleaning your pet's bottom.
Compostable wipes: Our planet-friendly, plastic-free pet cleansing wipes help you live a more eco-conscious life.

name: Petpost Large Grooming Wipes for Dogs | 70 Count Deodorizing Dog Cleaning Wipes with Coconut Extract & Aloe | Gentle Pet Wipes with Cherry Blossom Scent for Full-Body Grooming
short_description: FULL-BODY GROOMING WIPES. Gentle dog grooming wipes designed to clean your dog’s coat, fur, and sensitive areas. Perfect for refreshing between baths or after outdoor adventures.

COCONUT EXTRACT & ALOE FORMULA. Made with naturally soothing ingredients like coconut extract and aloe to help keep your dog’s coat soft, fresh, and manageable. Free from parabens, sulfates, and harsh irritants.
EXTRA LARGE 5” x 7” WIPES. Each wipe is luxuriously soft, thick, and durable. The oversized cotton pads make it easy to cover more area with fewer wipes, simplifying grooming and deodorizing.
MADE IN THE USA & ECO-CONSCIOUS. Proudly made in the USA with recyclable packaging. Petpost grooming wipes are created with sustainability in mind for healthier pets and a cleaner planet.
PART OF THE PETPOST ROUTINE. Pair these grooming wipes with Petpost Paw Wipes, Wrinkle Wipes, or Tear Stain Remover Wipes for a full cleaning routine that keeps your dog looking and feeling fresh.

name: Wet Ones for Cats Freshening Wipes, Multi-Purpose Cat Grooming Wipes with Aloe Vera, Helps Remove Dirt, Odor, and Dander Between Baths, Fresh Scent, 50 Count
short_description: CAT GROOMING WIPES: Designed specifically for cats to help clean paws, coat, and face by removing surface dirt, dander, and odors between baths at home or during travel.
FRESHENING BETWEEN BATHS: Helps maintain a clean feel between full baths by gently wiping away debris after litter box use, playtime, or daily indoor activity.
MADE FOR ROUTINE CAT CARE: Formulated for regular grooming routines so cat owners can freshen their cat without water, rinsing, or stressful bath setups.
ALOE VERA ENRICHED: Includes aloe vera to support gentle cleaning while helping keep fur comfortable during frequent use on paws, coat, and face.
QUICK CLEANUP FORMAT: Ready-to-use wipes allow fast cleanups at home or on the go, making everyday cat hygiene simple and convenient.
LIGHT FRESH SCENT: Leaves a mild, pleasant scent that helps manage cat odors while keeping coats smelling clean after each use.
FOR INDOOR CATS: Ideal for indoor cats that need regular freshening to manage shedding, dander, and everyday odors between baths.
product_description: Wet Ones for Pets Freshening Multi-Purpose Wipes for Cats are designed with your pet in mind for a quick, gentle, & healthy clean anytime, anywhere! These cat wipes for bathing are the perfect solution for a quick and easy refresh for your furry friend without the fuss of a traditional bath. Cat bath wipes from Wet Ones are formulated with soothing aloe vera to help moisturize your cat's skin and leave behind a soft and healthy, glowing coat. Cat grooming wipes from Wet Ones are infused with a light fresh scent fragrance to ensure your cat always smells fresh and clean! Directions: 1. Remove wipe from canister and reseal to maintain freshness. 2. Wipe down cat from back of neck to tail, carefully avoiding the eyes. 3. Dispose of wipe in trash, do not flush. 4. Play on! Inactive Ingredients: Water, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, PEG-75 Lanolin, Quaternium-52, PEG-8 Dimethicone, Fragrance,Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Disodium EDTA, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract，Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Cetylpyridinium Chloride, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid. WARNINGS: For external use only. Safe for cats 8 weeks of age and older. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Distributed by Fetch for Pets New York, NY 10018 USA Made in China WET ONES is a trademark of Edgewell Personal Care Brands, LLC and is used under license. 2020 Edgewell. YOUR SATISFACTION IS OUR PRIORITY: If you have any questions or feedback, please reach out to us at Fetch for Pets.

short_description: EXTRA-LARGE, ULTRA-SOFT & HYPOALLERGENIC - 8x8", thick, plush wipes designed for sensitive skin - perfect for paws, face, ears, bum, and full-body use. Cleanups are faster, gentler, and more comforting for your pet.

NATURAL INGREDIENT BLEND FOR SKIN + COAT HEALTH - Made with aloe vera, yucca, coconut oil, avocado, and cucumber to moisturize, soothe irritation, reduce odors, and keep your pet’s coat soft, shiny, and fresh.

PH-BALANCED, ALCOHOL-FREE, PARABEN-FREE & CRUELTY-FREE - A plant-based, non-toxic formula safe for daily use on dogs, puppies, and cats. Gently cleans without stripping natural oils or causing irritation.
RELAXING LAVENDER FOR A CALM, HAPPY PET - Light, soothing lavender helps reduce stress during grooming, turning quick wipe-downs into a peaceful bonding moment your pet actually enjoys.

VALUE 4-PACK + 4 BONUS GLOVE WIPES (TRAVEL FRIENDLY) - Four 100-count packs plus four convenient glove wipes for on-the-go cleaning. Resealable lids lock in moisture making it ideal for walks, car rides, parks, and daily touch-ups.

short_description: WET ONES WIPES FOR DOGS - Wet Ones hand wipes are now available for your favorite furry friends. The same team that brought you Wet Ones wipes for humans now has dog wipes for ears, dog wipes for eyes, and dog wipes for snouts
DOG WIPES - Great for dogs with sensitive skin and dogs with dry skin, these Wet Ones Wipes for Dogs are mild yet effective for dirt and debris
FRAGRANCE-FREE PET WIPES - Unscented dog wipes are mild and suitable for all dogs, especially those with an aversion to scents and fragrances
EASY TO USE - The Wet Ones for Pets 50 count canister is easy to use and closes to lock in moisture and freshness. After you're done using the wipes, simply close the top to keep wipes moist
WITH VITAMINS A, C & E - In order to keep your puppy's skin and coat healthy, nourished, and moisturized, these wipes for dogs from Wet Ones include vitamins A, C & E for an all-over feel-good clean
product_description: Wet Ones for Pets Multipurpose Wipes for Dogs are designed with your pet in mind for a quick, gentle, & healthy clean anytime, anywhere! These wipes for dogs are a fragrance-free way to keep your pet comfortable and clean. The wipes for dogs are non-irritating, making them great for dogs with sensitive skin. Multi-purpose dog wipes address dirt and dander that could be on your dog's coat. They're great wipes for dogs to use in between baths. These OK, easy to use dog wipes are formulated with Vitamin A, C & E to naturally soothe, hydrate, and calm skin to help maintain a healthy, shiny coat . The 50 count canister seals easily to lock in freshness and preserve moisture. Made specifically for pets and OK for use after outdoor playtime or indoors, these Wet Ones wipes keep and your home clean and smelling fresh. Also be sure to check out other varieties of Wet Ones for Pets for both cats and dogs.Directions for Use: 1. Remove wipe from canister and close top to maintain freshness. 2. Wipe down dog from back of neck to tail, carefully avoiding the eyes. 3. Dispose of wipe in trash, do not flush. 4. Play on! WARNINGS: For external use only. OK for dogs 8 weeks of age and older.
